## RangeSliderProps interface

Props of [RangeSlider](./react-native-material-kit.rangeslider.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RangeSliderProps extends ViewProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [lowerTrackColor](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.lowertrackcolor.md) | <code>any</code> | Color of the lower part of the track, it's also the color of the thumb |
|  [max](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.max.md) | <code>number</code> | Upper limit of the range, default is <code>100</code> |
|  [min](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.min.md) | <code>number</code> | Lower limit of the range, default is <code>0</code> |
|  [onChange](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.onchange.md) | <code>(range: NumRange) =&gt; void</code> | Callback when value changed |
|  [onConfirm](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.onconfirm.md) | <code>(range: NumRange) =&gt; void</code> | Callback when the value is confirmed |
|  [onStart](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.onstart.md) | <code>ThumbGestureCallback</code> | Callback when drag gesture begins |
|  [range](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.range.md) | <code>NumRange</code> | Initial value of range |
|  [step](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.step.md) | <code>number</code> | Step value of the RangeSlider, must be a divisor of max |
|  [thumbPadding](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.thumbpadding.md) | <code>number</code> | Padding for the hitSlop on the RangeSlider thumb |
|  [thumbRadius](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.thumbradius.md) | <code>number</code> | Radius of the thumb of the RangeSlider |
|  [trackSize](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.tracksize.md) | <code>number</code> | The thickness of the RangeSlider track |
|  [upperTrackColor](./react-native-material-kit.rangesliderprops.uppertrackcolor.md) | <code>any</code> | Color of the upper part of the track |
